meanings.definition: An area of short, mown grass in a yard or garden.
meanings.sent1: The children played tag on the soft lawn.
meanings.sent2: My dad mows the lawn every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent3: The lawn looked like a green carpet under the sun.
meanings.sent4: The lawn stretched out like a welcoming green blanket.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh-cut grass filled the air as I walked on the lawn.

meanings.definition: A fine linen or cotton fabric used for clothing.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful dress made of delicate lawn.
meanings.sent2: The shirt was made of soft, breathable lawn fabric.
meanings.sent3: His lawn shirt was so light, it felt like wearing air.
meanings.sent4: The lawn fabric draped elegantly, enhancing her beauty.
meanings.sent5: The lawn material was so smooth against her skin, she felt like royalty.
